se.axisandandroids.networking
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  se.axisandandroids.networking.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Connection supplies high level networking to send and receive-threads. Send-methods are only used by ONE SendThread and receive-methods are only used by ONE receive thread by design.

Author:
jgrstrm, zol, fattony, calliz
